intro.text: What a pleasure to have you here. At PALMA, Rio de Janeiro meets the world, culture integrates with nature, and stories become bridges to a more sustainable future.

who.title: Who makes it happen
text: At PALMA PRODUÇÕES, Brazil comes to life in stories, and the land is cherished in every frame. Our eyes shine with the opportunity to bring narratives to the world that promote a sense of belonging to our Brazilian identity by valuing memory and identity, and inspiring sustainable practices for a desirable tomorrow.

Our mission is to connect artistic and cultural expression with the defense of human rights and the sustainability of the planet. Our values are rooted in diversity, inclusion, social and environmental responsibility, creating a unique synergy between creativity and positive impact.

This is what motivates us to engage in creative, strategic, and collaborative processes - combining innovation, communication, and sustainability - **to highlight the protagonism of those who make history happen.**

cta.title: Let's create something amazing together!
cta.text: Join us on this journey where every image and every word matter, where our culture takes root, and our connection to Mother Earth propels us forward.
